title: StickyHands Inc. | Supercell Style
news1_title: StickyHands Releases New Update for Merge Survival!
news1_desc: Dive into new challenges with our latest content update...
news2_title: Solitaire Cat Islands Hits 1 Million Downloads!
news2_desc: A huge thank you to our purr-fect players...
news3_title: Behind the Scenes: Developing Pick Me Up
news3_desc: A look into the creation of our latest hit...
vision_desc: At StickyHands Inc., we believe in crafting captivating mobile games that bring joy and challenge to players worldwide. Our mission is to innovate, entertain, and build vibrant communities around our creations.
mission_desc: Founded by passionate game developers, we're dedicated to pushing the boundaries of mobile entertainment and creating experiences that stand the test of time.
careers_intro: Are you a passionate game maker looking to create impact? Join StickyHands Inc. and help us shape the future of mobile gaming!
job1_desc: Unity C# expert with a passion for mobile mechanics.
job2_desc: Creative visionary with strong UI/UX and 2D/3D art skills.
job3_desc: Engage with our players and grow our vibrant community.
support_intro: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues.
faq_desc: Find answers to common questions and troubleshooting tips.
contact_support_desc: Submit a ticket and our team will get back to you.
mc_tagline: A delightful puzzle adventure full of adorable cats.
mc_about_desc: Discover and merge a world of adorable cats in this delightful puzzle adventure. Combine cats to unlock new breeds and restore their magical world.
mc_feature1_desc: Discover hundreds of unique and charming cat breeds.
mc_feature2_desc: Explore and restore beautiful floating islands.
mc_feature3_desc: Enjoy satisfying merge gameplay at your own pace.
ms_tagline: Craft, build, and merge your way to survival.
ms_about_desc: A unique blend of merge puzzle and survival strategy. Craft, explore, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world. Every merge counts as you fight for your life against mutants and scavengers. Can you rebuild civilization from the remnants of the old world?
ms_feature1_desc: Combine items to craft tools, weapons, and shelter.
ms_feature2_desc: Explore a huge, procedurally generated world full of dangers and secrets.
ms_feature3_desc: Design and build your own fortified camp to protect yourself from threats.
ci_about_desc: A relaxing blend of classic solitaire and island decoration. Play cards, win rewards, and build a beautiful paradise for your feline friends.
ci_feature1_desc: Enjoy the timeless card game you know and love.
ci_feature2_desc: Use your winnings to create a stunning island paradise.
ci_feature3_desc: Unlock adorable cats to live on your island.
fv_tagline: Build your farm, one card at a time.
fv_about_desc: Experience the fun of solitaire while building your very own charming farm. Harvest crops, raise animals, and grow your village.
fv_feature1_desc: Hundreds of challenging solitaire levels to complete.
fv_feature2_desc: Plant crops, raise animals, and decorate your dream farm.
fv_feature3_desc: Come back every day for new challenges and rewards.
ct_tagline: Build your restaurant to the sky!
ct_about_desc: Reach for the sky in this exciting solitaire adventure. Clear cards to build your tower and unlock delicious new recipes.
ct_feature1_desc: Play solitaire to build your cooking tower floor by floor.
ct_feature2_desc: Discover and master recipes from around the world.
ct_feature3_desc: Decorate your tower and create the restaurant of your dreams.
aos_tagline: Build civilizations through the power of cards.
aos_about_desc: Journey through history with this epic solitaire game. Build wonders, uncover ancient artifacts, and master the cards.
aos_feature1_desc: Travel from the Stone Age to the Future Age.
aos_feature2_desc: Construct the Pyramids, the Colosseum, and more.
aos_feature3_desc: Watch your civilization evolve as you play.
rf_tagline: Steal from the rich, give to the poor!
rf_about_desc: Join Robin Hood on a fruity quest! A fun and challenging puzzle game for all ages.
rf_feature1_desc: Shoot arrows to match and collect fruits.
rf_feature2_desc: Explore a vibrant world based on the classic tale.
rf_feature3_desc: Use special arrows and abilities to beat tricky levels.
jm_about_desc: An exciting and addictive jumping game. How high can you go?
jm_feature1_desc: Jump from platform to platform in an endless vertical climb.
jm_feature2_desc: Discover and play as dozens of unique characters.
jm_feature3_desc: Dodge enemies and traps as you ascend.
pr_about_desc: A battle royale with a piggy twist. Can you be the last pig standing?
pr_feature1_desc: Engage in quick and chaotic battles for survival.
pr_feature2_desc: Collect and upgrade a variety of pigs with unique skills.
pr_feature3_desc: Play solo, duo, or in special event modes.
ml_tagline: A beautiful and enchanting musical journey.
ml_about_desc: Tap to the rhythm and explore a magical world. A beautiful and enchanting musical journey.
ml_feature1_desc: Tap along to an emotional and beautiful soundtrack.
ml_feature2_desc: Experience a touching story as you progress.
ml_feature3_desc: Explore a world with a unique and beautiful art style.
pu_tagline: A fun and fast-paced arcade game.
pu_about_desc: A fun and fast-paced arcade game. Pick up the characters and drop them off at their destination.
pu_feature1_desc: Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay.
pu_feature2_desc: Collect dozens of cool and wacky cars.
pu_feature3_desc: How many passengers can you pick up?

error_check_console: Check the browser's developer console (F12) for network errors.
